updateAllLights() - Method in class alston.minecraft.Sunlight
Updates all lights in sunlight.
updateCollisionShape() - Method in class alston.minecraft.Chunk
Either submits a new thread that will concurrently create a new CollisionShape to update the old one, or check on it to see if it's done.
updateLighting() - Method in class alston.minecraft.Light
Proprogates lighting thru the Blocks and applies it's effects to the Block's lightLevel value if it's high than it's current one.
updateLights() - Static method in class alston.minecraft.Light
Starts a thread to update all lighting.
updateVertices() - Method in class alston.minecraft.Block
Update the vertex colors of the Mesh of the Spatial and updates the memoization.
Utility - Class in alston.minecraft
Class that contains utility functions that can be applicable in multiple situations, or is to be used by multiple classes.
